scripts.build: cd wasm-bindgen && cargo build -p wasm-bindgen-cli --bin wasm-bindgen && cd .. && cargo build -p worker-build
scripts.test: cd test && NO_MINIFY=1 WASM_BINDGEN_PATH=../wasm-bindgen/target/debug/wasm-bindgen ../target/debug/worker-build --dev && NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-vm-modules' npx vitest run
scripts.test-http: cd test && NO_MINIFY=1 WASM_BINDGEN_PATH=../wasm-bindgen/target/debug/wasm-bindgen ../target/debug/worker-build --dev --features http && NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-vm-modules' npx vitest run
scripts.lint:fix: cargo fmt && cargo clippy --features d1,queue --all-targets --workspace --fix -- -D warnings
